content: **inside the designer s mind** elliot 2x2 rib beanie is a classic yet versatile beanie that will go perfectly with your winter wardrobe it s easy to style and looks great for a casual look it is knitted with a light fingering weight yarn and in small gauge in order to achieve a more sophisticated look it is perfect for gift knitting as it suits all genders and ages **size** for 57cm 22 5 head circumference fitted **materials** approximately 35 g/245m 268 yds of light fingering weight yarn 100% wool 50g/350m/383 yds **needles** us 1/2 25mm dpns or 100cm circular needle for magic loop method if you prefer for working in the round **gauge** 45 sts / 50 row = 10cm 4 in 2x2 rib stitch using us 1/2 25mm needles before blocking **notions** stitch marker tapestry needle **skill level** beginner
